Package monster

Class Monster

java.lang.Object
monster.Monster
Direct Known Subclasses:
Dragon, Gnome, Goblin, Griffin, Imp, Unicorn
public class Monster extends Object
The Class Monster. This class is the super class to all other monsters. Each monster object contains the attributes of each monster which determines gameplay
